title: Niksa 2/4 Pack Compression Shorts Men with Pocket, Spandex Running Shorts Sport Athletic Workout Performance Underwear
description: 【Compression Support】Our mens compression shorts feature an ergonomic design and 4-way stretch fabric to provide optimal support and strong compression for your hip and thigh muscles, stabilizing your muscles during exercise, accelerating post-exercise muscle recovery, and reducing lactic acid buildup.

【Breathable & Quick-dry】Our men's sports compression shorts are made of 88% polyester and 12% spandex, which quickly releases heat and absorbs moisture, keeping them dry and odor-free even when worn for extended periods of time.

【Flatlock Stitching】Mens compression underwear feature flat lock stitches to increase durability and reduce skin irritation, preventing chafing during exercise. Brings great comfort to any exercise without interfering with exercise.

【Ripstop Elastic Waistband】Compression shorts men with pocket are designed with a wide waistband for a better fit around the waist, bringing a comfortable wearing experience as well as non-slip and non-deformation. The tear-resistant design of the waistband is durable.

【Designed for All Sports】Compression underwear provide sun protection and are suitable for all weather sports such as: exercise, running, basketball, fitness, biking, baseball, tennis, weight training, surfing, squats, soccer, etc.
